meanings.sent1: She is the talkiest person in our class.
meanings.sent2: My sister is the talkiest one at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The talkiest student in the school won the debate competition.
meanings.sent4: Her parrot is the talkiest bird I have ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The talkiest cat in the neighborhood never stops meowing.

meanings.sent1: She chatted talkiest during the party.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled talkiest while playing together.
meanings.sent3: The parrot mimicked the teacher talkiest during the lesson.
meanings.sent4: The radio host spoke talkiest during the morning show.
meanings.sent5: The friends laughed talkiest at the funny movie.

meanings.sent1: Her constant chatter was the talkiest in the office.
meanings.sent2: The talkiest at the meeting was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent3: The talkiest at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The talkiest in the group shared all the latest gossip.
meanings.sent5: The talkiest in the class always had a story to tell.
